name: The Player RPG
description:
A normal day at the super market a crazy fellow told you he can take you inside a video game, sadly due to your low income you only affort to enter an old school 2d JRPG...

Enjoy a game that doesnt take itself to serius but offers depth in every system.

Features:

Dual Class system.
Classic Turn Based battles.
8 recruitable Characters.
19 Different Classes to Unlock.
Hundreds of Skills.
Hidden Items and Classes.
An Original Story with all the clitché you can handle.
And more!
